DataElement.preferredName: First Complete or Partial Remission Response Year Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The year the patient first responded with either a complete or partial response.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Complete Remission Or Partial Remission Response Observed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to first (temporal) disappearance of all study disease observed._The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A finding indicating that there is a decrease in the size and the extent of tissue involvement by a malignant tumor in a patient._Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ObjectClass.preferredName: First Complete Remission Or Partial Remission Response
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A finding indicating that there is a decrease in the size and the extent of tissue involvement by a malignant tumor in a patient.:Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A finding indicating that there is a decrease in the size and the extent of tissue involvement by a malignant tumor in a patient.
Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Property.preferredDefinition: Observed; discovered or determined by scientific observation.

Concepts.definition: Ascertained or determined through monitoring or observation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Something that happens at a given place and time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for TCGA to collect Exceptional Responder data per request by T.Lichtenberg. mc 6/23/15
